meta.description: Optimize the allocation of land to traditional and modern machines to maximize tea leaves picked.

sets.name: MACHINES
sets.description: Types of machines available for picking tea leaves.

params.name: tea_leaves_per_acre
params.description: Kilograms of tea leaves picked per acre by each machine.

params.name: waste_per_acre
params.description: Kilograms of waste created per acre by each machine.

params.name: fuel_per_acre
params.description: Liters of fuel required per acre by each machine.

params.name: max_waste
params.description: Maximum waste that can be handled in kilograms.

vars.name: acres
vars.description: Number of acres allocated to each machine.

objective.name: max_tea_leaves
objective.expr: sum(acres[m] * tea_leaves_per_acre[m] for m in MACHINES)
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of tea leaves picked.

constraints.name: land_constraint
constraints.description: Total acres used cannot exceed available land.

constraints.name: fuel_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(acres[m] * fuel_per_acre[m] for m in MACHINES)
constraints.description: Total fuel used cannot exceed available fuel.

constraints.name: waste_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(acres[m] * waste_per_acre[m] for m in MACHINES)
constraints.description: Total waste created cannot exceed maximum waste capacity.
